name: TransportationInsecurityGoals
title: Transportation Insecurity Goals
description: There are currently no existing domain specific LOINC codes for transportation insecurity. That value set will be added to this group once it is available.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> 
The value sets in this group represent the goals associated with transportation insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of goal.description.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT goals that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

contains.display: Feels transportation time to destination is acceptable (finding)
Able to afford transportation related expense (finding)
Has transportation that meets individual's cognitive needs (finding)
Has transportation that meets individual's functional needs (finding)
Has transportation to access community resources (finding)
Has transportation to access health care (finding)
